name: Almond Milk Instant Pudding
author: kaleighna
summary: This pudding is made with instant pudding mix and almond milk and has the perfect taste and consistency. Takes just slightly more effort than normal.
ingredients: 1 (3.5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
directions: Pour 1 cup almond milk into a small saucepan
Add cornstarch and heat over medium heat
Cook, stirring constantly, until bubbly, 3 to 5 minutes
Remove from heat; keep stirring for 30 seconds
Pour remaining almond milk into a bowl; add pudding mix
Mix with an electric mixer on low speed until very thick, about 1 minute
Add cornstarch mixture to the pudding mixture
Mix at low speed for 1 minute more
Transfer pudding to 4 individual serving bowls
